definition[0]: increasing in amount or value gradually and by a regular amount
example[1]: Mr Kennedy said that progress on reforms would be incremental.
definition[2]: an incremental process is one where things happen in small steps
example[3]: Kaizen, a Japanese concept of incremental improvements in products through team efforts
definition[3]: an incremental amount, sum etc is small when considered by itself
example[4]: The cuts are incremental (2% to 3%), not radical, but they add up.
